languages.english-overview:
Redaxscript is an ultra lightweight website engine, simplifying the world of complex online projects.
Experience the future of web design and development - leave behind the confusion and build websites intuitively.
Redaxscript is released under the MIT License.

ul.li: HTML5, CSS3, RSS2 and ATOM1 compliant
On-demand loader for Javascript and CSS
Pre-optimized with Page Speed and Yslow

languages.english-no_pass_encrypt: Could not encrypt admin password because the domain is not pointing to the correct server
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
languages.english-err_pass_redax: Password should be at least 10 characters with a combination of lower case, upper case, and digits.
